title: AIR_ENTHALPY Function
description:
AIR_ENTHALPY calculates the enthalpy of moist air from the statements T

for temperature in degrees Celsius and relative humidity RH in % (50 =

50%). The enthalpy is calculated in joules/gram.

22 Version 1.00

Chapter 5. Heating, Ventilation, Air Condition
name: AIR_ENTHALPY

input.name: RH
input.description: Relative humidity of the air in percentage.

output.name: Enthalpy
output.description: The enthalpy of moist air calculated in joules/gram.

return_value.description: The calculated enthalpy of air in J/g.
